SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class OrderItem

Object
datamodel.OrderItem
public class OrderItem extends Object
Class of a line item referring to an article that is part of an Order. Orders may have multiple order items.
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F12-Refactoring"
Author:
"sgraupner"
